definition: see 燈心草|灯心草[deng1 xin1 cao3]

sentences.english: If the teacher is a lamp, I'm reluctant to burning wick.
sentences.chinese: 如果老師是一盞燈，我就是捨不得燃燒的燈芯。
牛皮鞋底自然燈芯水分。

sentences.english: I won't care, because I'll be wearing corduroy.
sentences.chinese: 我都不會在意，因爲我會穿燈芯絨。

sentences.english: Horsetail rushes in prehistoric times grew to immense size.
sentences.chinese: 史前的木賊燈芯草長得很大。

sentences.english: Borowski wears corduroy suits and plays the accordion.
sentences.chinese: 博羅夫斯基身着一套燈芯絨西裝，會拉手風琴。

sentences.english: The wick with degrease cotton and edible oils production.
sentences.chinese: 燈芯採用脫脂純棉及食用油脂製作。

sentences.english: My favorite kind of pants are corduroys.
sentences.chinese: 最喜歡的褲子類型是燈芯絨褲子。

sentences.english: Friday marks The Date That Most Resembles Corduroy.
sentences.chinese: 本週五的日期有史以來最像燈芯絨。

sentences.english: Improvement wick thick thin after test record.
sentences.chinese: 改進燈芯粗細後的測試紀錄。

sentences.english: She turned the wick down, lifted off the globe, and breathed onthe sulky flame.
sentences.chinese: 她把燈芯捻低，取下燈罩，對着發蔫的火頭哈了口氣。

sentences.english: That's the strange world of the dark-eyed junco .
sentences.chinese: 這就是黑眼燈芯草雀奇異的世界。

sentences.english: The candles are in need of snuffing .
sentences.chinese: 這些蠟燭的燈芯需要剪短。

sentences.english: He wore brown corduroy pants and a white cotton shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他身着棕色燈芯絨褲子和白色棉襯衫。

sentences.english: The wick is new and I've filled it up for you.
sentences.chinese: 燈芯是新的，油也加滿了。

sentences.english: He set a socket in each pedestal .
sentences.chinese: 他把每根基座上都按上了燈芯盤。

definition: to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
item made from woven silk or rayon
lit. twin lotus flowers on one stalk/fig. a devoted married couple
